summary: Jungle guide David Marchand is kidnapped by a tribe of natives who want to sacrifice him to their white rhino god. Just as he's about to be killed, however, he is thrown backwards in time ... See full summary »
cast: Martine Beswick|Edina Ronay|Michael Latimer|Stephanie Randall|Carol White|Alexandra Stevenson|Yvonne Horner|Sydney Bromley|Frank Hayden|Robert Raglan|Mary Hignett|Louis Mahoney|Bari Jonson|Danny Daniels|Steven Berkoff|Jasmin Broughton|Sally Caclough|Dido Plumb|Roy Stewart|Nikki Van der Zyl|Jeannette Wild
title: Mujeres prehistóricas
